li.label: Sick
li.description: I think have a flu.. I feel so weak. I might be down for days.

li.label: Nauseated
li.description: I suddenly felt nauseated and sick, I threw up a lot didn't I?

li.label: Stricken with Scurvy
li.description: My legs, arms and whole body hurts and my wounds doesn't seem to be healing.

li.label: Took Medicine
li.description: That medicine was miraculous. I'm still feeling a bit woozy, but overall I'm good to go.

li.label: A colonist is sick
li.description: A colonist is sick, we'd better be careful on what he/she is having, it could be worse.

li.label: A colonist just died of old age.
li.description: A colonist had just passed away he/she lived a long and fruitful life, may he/she rest in peace.

li.label: A colonist just died of heavy wounds.
li.description: A colonist had just passed away, he/she couldn't hold on to dear life, may he/she rest in peace.

li.label: A colonist had experienced a stroke
li.description: One of the colonist suddenly tumbled down, he/she should take it easy and rest, good thing we acted quickly and reached him/her to bed.

li.label: A nightmare is happening
li.description: First an eclipse an now this! when is this nightmare going to end.

li.label: Survived a meteor apocalypse
li.description: I looked at death itself, good thing I'm still here.

li.label: I could go home.
li.description: The feeling that you can go home after having experienced so much is tantalizing, but I just can't leave this planet. This place is now my home.

li.label: I looked at a meteor shower.
li.description: The cosmos, still so beautiful even after abandoning me here.

li.label: Experienced a prison break.
li.description: The prisoners were so crafty they managed to destroy all the doors! everyone was running amok! did we even catch someone?

li.label: A prisoner committed suicide.
li.description: How do you even kill yourself in prison?

li.label: Experienced a prison riot
li.description: Now that was a definition of anarchy, I wanted to throw punches too!

li.label: A fellow colonist just turned on us!
li.description: To think that our former friend would sell us to raiders. This is such a cruel universe.

li.label: Experienced a traumatic phenomenon
li.description: Everything went black for a few seconds, and most colonists were down on their knees, my head hurts like hell.
